topics.body:
So someone introduced me to sword art online and dog days. . . . I'm never listening to that person again cause even though sword art has a trap main character and dog days has people with animal ears and tails they're still both utter crap.  You know something is utter crap when I can't even find any enjoyment out of something that has animal ears on people.

Dog days can best be summarized as a children's show failed abortion.

Dog Days summarized is that the hero is taken to a magical land with animal people to win a war.

Immediate problem with it: for a series centered around "war" nobody ever gets injured and war crimes are punished by booping the person on the head.
